description:
Are you struggling with setting up your own WordPress website or blog?

Sick of outdated training on older versions of WordPress that are never updated and more instructional rather than eduicational?

Do you want to learn WordPress best practices for building, maintaining, protecting, and monetizing a successful website?

Then please read on...

Learn all you need to know about WordPress 4 on-wards, and remain on top ALL its features, while learning all you need to know to easily build your own website or blog and making it a success.


I leave no stone un-turned on how to build a successful website, easily, and without wasting time and money on plugins, themes, courses, and training that just does not work or make things easier?

This training is updated as WordPress updates it system and makes changes, and I do my best to keep everything as simple as can be. If you are not a programmer... lucky you!

These videos are techie free so that anyone can understand them and start to learn all you will ever need to know. That means YOU!

Save time and money, no up-sells , no additional or advanced training... just the know-how to get your website ready (and live... fast) with our detailed 'over-the-shoulder' step-by-step video tutorials.

As a SPECIAL BONUS we are:

  • Giving away free themes and plugins for you to use on your site (if you need them)
  • Learn important Search Engine Optimization (SEO) rules and best practices
  • Understand the basics of the Legalities of owning a site and what you need to protect you
  • Discover how to secure your site easily (and for free). This is super important!
  • Learn different ways of monetizing your site and online business and how to do it properly
  • ...and other really cool training that no-one offers... especially for FREE!

Thank you, and please enjoy!

Your requests and feedback are welcome!
title: WordPress 4+ Unveiled - Up To Date Trainings - ALWAYS
